content: As you can see, images are automatically resized to fit the preview area while maintaining their aspect ratio. Cover images are displayed larger than content images.

The enhanced preview provides several benefits:
Real-time visual feedback: See exactly how your images will appear in the final output.
Automatic resizing: Images are intelligently resized to fit the preview while maintaining quality.
Error handling: Missing or invalid images show helpful error messages.
Memory management: Images are cached efficiently to prevent memory leaks.
This enhancement makes the Book Renderer Tool much more powerful for creating visually rich content!
